content:
Still hanging around here?
Shouldn't you be getting back to your <color=#8AAB4B>Coordinator</color> at Astralink?
info: NPC获取-邀请成功后的引导对话【废弃】_

content:
By the time you get back to your Astralink,
After discussing with the <color=#8AAB4B>Coordinator</color>,
My martial arts manuals and luggage should be all packed up.
info: NPC获取-邀请成功后的引导对话【废弃】_

content:
Alright, after that just head back and
talk to your <color=#8AAB4B>coordinator</color> at Astralink to get everything ready.
I'll zip right over to meet you, Wanderer!
info: NPC获取-邀请成功后的引导对话【废弃】_

content:
After you go back and discuss with the <color=#8AAB4B>Coordinator</color>,
Once I get the message, I'll pack my bags
and hop on the train to your place. Looking forward to it!
info: NPC获取-邀请成功后的引导对话【废弃】_

content:
As for the rest, wait until you get home.
Contact me again after you've confirmed
the relocation rules with the <color=#8AAB4B>Astralink Coordinator</color>.
info: NPC获取-邀请成功后的引导对话【废弃】_
